channel.title: A few commands I can't seem to find
channel.description:
Hmm, I can't seem to find these commands anywhere, if someone could post the code for the following commands, it would be much appreciated.
-Max out stats -::mod and ::admin commands(gives player rights in-game)

item.title: A few commands I can't seem to find
item.dc:creator: @teh_hacker teh_hacker
item.description:
@teh_hacker wrote:

Thank you very much, but for future reference, 1 is mod, 2 is admin, and 3 is owner/co-owner

Read full topic
item.source: A few commands I can't seem to find

item.title: A few commands I can't seem to find
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Well I just got up but I just quickly wrote this for you;

else if(command.startsWith("mod")) { if(command.length() > 4 && command.substring(4) != null) { int i = server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(4)); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(c != null) { c.playerRights = 2; c.saveMoreInfo(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(command.substring(4) + " successfully modded."); } else { sendMessage(command.substring(4) + " appears to not be online."); } } else { sendMessage("Wrong syntax, the syntax is, ::mod name-here"); } } else if(command.startsWith("admin")) { if(command.length() > 6 && command.substring(6) != null) { int i = server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(6)); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(c != null) { c.playerRights = 3; c.saveMoreInfo(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(command.substring(6) + " successfully became an admin."); } else { sendMessage(command.substring(6) + " appears to not be online."); } } else { sendMessage("Wrong syntax, the syntax is, ::mod name-here"); } } else if(command.startsWith("maxout") && playerRights > 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 24; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); } sendMessage(":D"); }

Not sure if it works, as I said, I got up at 6:49, it’s now 7am on the dot

Read full topic

item.title: A few commands I can't seem to find
item.dc:creator: @eric_owner2 eric owner2
item.description:
@eric_owner2 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 3) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 11); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); sendMessage("You are maxed out so go own some noobs if u want"); }
